plot: Brothers Huck and Jim Botko did not get along while growing up. Because of an embarrassing childhood moment, Huck decides to make peace by making a graham cracker cream pie. With extra "ingredients" and interesting results.
title: Graham Cracker Cream Pie
plot_es: Brothers Huck and Jim Botko did not get along while growing up. Because of an embarrassing childhood moment, Huck decides to make peace by making a graham cracker cream pie. With extra "ingredients" and interesting results.
plot_en: Brothers Huck and Jim Botko did not get along while growing up. Because of an embarrassing childhood moment, Huck decides to make peace by making a graham cracker cream pie. With extra "ingredients" and interesting results.
